name: File
description: A File represents an entry to a system file.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: If on Server, this is the Path relative to server executable. Otherwise if on Client, this is the Path relative to Client's 'Packages/.transient/' folder

parameters.name: truncate
parameters.description: Whether or not to clear the file upon opening it

functions.name: Close
functions.description: Closes the file and destroys the entity

functions.name: IsEOF
functions.description: Checks if the file status is End of File

functions.name: IsBad
functions.description: Checks if the file status is Bad

functions.name: IsGood
functions.description: Checks if the file status is Good

functions.name: HasFailed
functions.description: Checks if the last operation has Failed

functions.name: Read
functions.description: Reads characters from the File and returns it. Also moves the file pointer to the latest read position. Pass 0 to read the whole file

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: Length to be read from file

functions.name: ReadAsync
functions.description: Reads characters from the File asynchronously.

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: Length to be read from file

functions.name: ReadLine
functions.description: Reads and returns the next file line

functions.name: ReadJSON
functions.description: Reads the whole file as a JSON and returns it.

functions.name: ReadJSONAsync
functions.description: Reads the whole file as a JSON and returns it asynchronously.

functions.name: Seek
functions.description: Sets the file pointer to a specific position

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Position to offset the file pointer

functions.name: Size
functions.description: Returns the size of the file

functions.name: Skip
functions.description: Skips n (amount) positions from the current file pointer position

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Amount to offset the file pointer

functions.name: Tell
functions.description: Returns the current file pointer position

functions.name: Write
functions.description: Writes the Data at the current position of the file

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Data to write to the file

static_functions.name: Time

return.description: the last update time in unix time

static_functions.description: Returns when a file was last modified in Unix time

static_functions.name: CreateDirectory
static_functions.description: Creates a Directory (for every folder passed)

static_functions.name: Exists
static_functions.description: Verifies if a entry exists in the file system

static_functions.name: IsDirectory
static_functions.description: Checks if a path is a directory

static_functions.name: IsRegularFile
static_functions.description: Checks if a path is a file
